price: Das ist die Huld von Allah, und Allah genügt als Allwissender.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
